tierone.choiceone: Amp up Security: cost 6 Muscle: Move to Tier Two and Chaos +4
tierone.choicetwo: Establish Surveillance: cost 3 Smarts and 3 Moxie: Move to Tier Two and Mafia Presence +4.

tiertwo.crimeeffect: Chaos goes up by one every turn.
tiertwo.choiceone: Shake Down Informants: cost 6 Muscle and 5 Moxie: Move to Tier Three and Police Corruption +4.
tiertwo.choicetwo: Piece Together Evidence: cost 7 Smarts and 4 Moxie: Move to Tier Three. +1 to all.

tierthree.crimeeffect: Heist countdown begins, 15 turns until it reaches zero, if it does, the players lose.
tierthree.choiceone: Heist in Progress! Rush the bank!: cost 8 Muscle and 5 Moxie.: Move to tier four. Chaos +4.
tierthree.choicetwo: Heist in Progress! Set up a perimeter!: cost 10 Smarts.: Move to tier four. Mafia Presence +5.

tierfour.crimeeffect: Countdown gains three counts (if the countdown was at 4 it's now at 7) but continues down, and if it reaches zero the players lose. +1 to all every turn.
tierfour.choiceone: Hostage Situation! Call in a negotiator: cost 7 Smarts and 5 Moxie.:s Move to tier five. Police Corruption +6.
tierfour.choicetwo: Hostage Situation! Take the shot: 9 Moxie + 4 Muscle.: Move to tier five. Add 6 to Chaos.

tierfive.crimeeffect: Countdown gains five counts, but still continues to countdown. Each category goes up by two each turn.
tierfive.choicefinal: Stop the Getaway!: 30 points total from the stat pools.: Players win.

tierone.choiceone: Bombs strapped to support pillars! Evacuate!: 2 Muscle + 2 Moxie: Move to Tier Two and Add 2 to Chaos
tierone.choicetwo: Bombs strapped to support pillars! Diffuse!: 6 Smarts: Move to Tier Two and subtract 1 to Chaos.

tiertwo.choiceone: Downtown Under Attack! Rush in!: 7 Muscle + 6 Moxie: Move to Tier Three and Add 1 to Chaos.
tiertwo.choicetwo: Downtown Under Attack! Keep a level head, secure a perimeter: 10 Smarts + 5 Moxie: Move to Tier Three. Subtract 2 to Chaos.

tierthree.crimeeffect: Lasts three turns, Chaos increases by 1 every turn. Can only pick one of the two choices once over the period of the three turns.
tierthree.choiceone: Calm before the storm. Investigate Biers: 8 Smarts + 3 Moxie.: Decrease cost of tier four choices by 3 Moxie.
tierthree.choicetwo: Calm Before the Storm. Prepare: 5 Smarts + 2 Muscle.: Subtract 2 to Chaos.

tierfour.crimeeffect: Chaos increases by 3. Chaos increases by 1 every turn.
tierfour.choiceone: Siege on Stony Gate! Sneak in: 10 Smarts + 7 Moxie.: Move to tier five. Add 2 to Chaos.
tierfour.choicetwo: Siege on Stony Gate! Guns Blazing!: 6 Moxie + 4 Muscle.: Move to tier five. Add 5 to Chaos.

tierfive.choicefinal: Stop the Assassination!: 15 total of Muscle and/or Smarts + 15 Moxie.: Players win.

tierone.choiceone: There's something happening here… Investigate nearby housing: 4 Smarts: Move to Tier Two. Add 2 Police Corruption.
tierone.choicetwo: There's something happening here... Investigate rumors circulating among the populace: 2 Smarts + 2 Moxie: Move to Tier Two and Add 4 to Mafia Presence.

tiertwo.choiceone: What it is ain't exactly clear... Get a warrant to search certain suspects: 6 Moxie + 4 Smarts: Move to Tier Three and Add 2 Mafia Presence.
tiertwo.choicetwo: What it is ain't exactly clear...Capture new recruits: 10 Muscle + 2 Moxie: Move to Tier Three. Subtract 1 to Mafia Presence, add 2 to Police Corruption.

tierthree.choiceone: There's a man with a gun over there... Storm the compounds: 12 Muscle.: Move to tier four. Add 4 to chaos and subtract 3 from mafia presence.
tierthree.choicetwo: There's a man with a gun over there… Send in a double agent: 5 Smarts and 5 Moxie.: Move to tier four. Add 2 to Mafia Presence.

tierfour.crimeeffect: Mafia presence increases by 1 every turn.
tierfour.choiceone: Telling me I got to beware... Firefight: 8 Moxie + 8 Muscle.: Move to tier five. Add 2 to Chaos subtract 3 from mafia presence.
tierfour.choicetwo: Telling me I got to beware... Gather evidence: 6 Moxie + 5 Smarts.: Move to tier five. Add 3 to Mafia presence but for the final choice you can spend 15 Muscle instead of twenty.

tierfive.crimeeffect: Mafia presence and chaos increases by 1 every turn.
tierfive.choicefinal: Stop! Hey! What's that sound!: 20 (15 if choice two was picked for tier four) Muscle total from the stat pools.: Players win.

tierone.choiceone: Patrol the streets - 4 Moxie: Move to Tier Two. Add 3 to Chaos
tierone.choicetwo: Pay off informants - 6 Smarts: Move to Tier Two. Add 3 to Corruption, but have 5 turns where tier two's effect doesn't take place.

tiertwo.crimeeffect: Corruption goes up by one every turn.
tiertwo.choiceone: Investigate “protected” stores - 8 Smarts + 3 Moxie: Move to Tier Three. Lower Corruption by 2.
tiertwo.choicetwo: “Talk” to some more unsavory types - 6 Muscle + 1 Moxie: Move to Tier Three. Add 2 to Corruption.

tierthree.crimeeffect: Corruption of officials begins, corruption stat is locked in place and cannot be lowered or raised (unless specified with an * below). Depending on the corruption level, the lieutenants will add to an overall corruption of officials.
tierthree.choiceone: Gather dirt on the officials. - 10 Smarts + 5 Moxie.: Move to tier four. Subtract police corruption by 1*, but increase official corruption by 1 turn. Adjust official corruption gain for tier four.
tierthree.choicetwo: Arrest a lieutenant! - 12 Muscle.: Move to tier four. Official corruption gain is now subtracted by 1/3 of what it once was, but police corruption is raised by 1*.

tierfour.crimeeffect: Official corruption continues as adjusted by the previous tier's choice. Every 4 turns police corruption is raised by 1*. Official corruption adjusts accordingly.
tierfour.choiceone: Arrest an official. - 10 Moxie: Move to tier five. Official corruption gain is now subtracted by 1/3 of what it once was, but police corruption is raised by 2*.
tierfour.choicetwo: Storm a mob base! - 15 Muscle + 5 Moxie.: Move to tier five. Official corruption gain is now subtracted by 2/3 of what it once was, police corruption is lowered by 2*, but Chaos is raised by 7.

tierfive.crimeeffect: Official corruption continues as adjusted by the previous tier's choice. Every 2 turns police corruption is raised by 2*. Official corruption adjusts accordingly.
tierfive.choicefinal: Arrest Giovanni! - 20 Smarts + 10 Moxie total from the stat pool.: Players win.

tierone.choiceone: “Question” the locals - 3 Muscle: Move to Tier Two. Add 1 to Mafia Presence and add 2 to Police Corruption.
tierone.choicetwo: Case the speakeasies - 4 Smarts + 4 Moxie: Move to Tier Two. Add 2 to Mafia Presence.

tiertwo.crimeeffect: Revenue from the stills starts. Each turn revenue will be added from the four stills spread throughout the city, starting from tier 2 to tier 5, each tier will be its own situation card representing a still that will be in a random section of the city. Once a still is dealt with, the revenue-per-turn will go down, but other tiers will introduce new effects based on choices.
tiertwo.choiceone: Infiltrate and sabotage the still. - 8 Moxie + 5 Muscle: Move to Tier Three. Revenue-per-turn is subtracted by a 1/4, but Mafia Presence goes up by 4.
tiertwo.choicetwo: Attack the still - 10 Muscle + 5 Moxie: Move to Tier Three. Revenue-per-turn is subtracted by a 1/4, but Chaos goes up by 4.

tierthree.crimeeffect: Revenue-per-turn is now at 3/4. Mafia presence increases by 1 every 2 turns.
tierthree.choiceone: Cordon a still and cut them off - 8 Muscle + 6 Moxie.: Move to tier four. Revenue-per-turn is subtracted by a 1/4, but Chaos goes up by 2.
tierthree.choicetwo: Steal the funds from the still - 10 Smarts + 6 Moxie.: Move to tier four. Revenue-per-turn is subtracted by a 1/4, total revenue loses a 1/6 of its progress, but Mafia Presence goes up by 4.

tierfour.crimeeffect: Revenue-per-turn is now at 1/2. Mafia presence increases by 2 every 2 turns, and Chaos increases by 1 every 2 turns.
tierfour.choiceone: Negotiate with the staff of the still. - 10 Moxie + 6 Smarts.: Move to tier five. Revenue-per-turn is subtracted by a 1/4, but Police Corruption goes up by 3.
tierfour.choicetwo: Call in the Feds! - 7 Muscle + 5 Moxie.: Move to tier five. Revenue-per-turn is subtracted by a 1/4, but Chaos goes up by 4.

tierfive.crimeeffect: Revenue-per-turn is now at 1/4. Mafia presence increases by 2 every 2 turns, and Chaos increases by 2 every 2 turns.
tierfive.choicefinal: Capture the last still! - 30 points total from the stat pools.: Players win.
